Cool stuff going down at the Ark. Once I get some new posts from the group I'll be jumping back in from here out.


--- On Sun, 4/20/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
> Subject: Re: OOC
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Sunday, April 20, 2008, 9:16 AM
> --- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> 
> > No much,
> > 
> > Malice still is inside the Blackfortress, Battle Preds
> vs maximals 
> > are outside and Azure is atemping to freed Nightlight.
> 
> 
> In addition to that - 
> 
> The Maximal crew that had been heading to the ark, they
> have
> successfully paused to run off Nightrazor who had been
> shadowing them,
> and are now resuming thier course to the ark. 
> 
> Meanwhile the minions who had been racing them there had
> reached the
> ark ahead of them. However they were fired upon by someone
> who looked
> like a black and red version Shockblast. Deepstryke was
> gravely wounded
> in the attack. 
> 
> The Ark intruder alert alarms went off, but then abruptly
> stopped.
> 
> Airly, will you be having your characters act before I
> continue?
> 
> Preston
